en: a light in a paper or silk container
ex: People light colorful lanterns during the festival.
Lantern Festival is the last day of the New Year celebration.

en: a time when family members gather together
sweet rice balls eaten during Lantern Festival
ex: People eat sweet dumplings called tangyuan.

en: a public procession with music and celebration
ex: There is a lantern parade in the city.

en: bright lights that explode in the sky
ex: Fireworks light up the night sky.

en: a traditional performance with a dragon costume
ex: The dragon dance is exciting to watch.

en: a custom handed down through generations
ex: The Lantern Festival is an old Chinese tradition.

en: to take part in an enjoyable activity for a holiday
ex: People celebrate the Lantern Festival happily.
The festival brings joy to everyone.
